Blog.post: Well here's the first of many to come. Enjoy =D... DBZ Character: urlLink Which DragonballZ Character are you? Cool! Though, I was hoping more for Gohan, oh well. DBZ Power Level: urlLink HAHAHA! I am a god! Bow down before my might. *stands still for a second* *blinks* Umm, oops. Sorry 'bout that. On to the next test! Anime Cliche: urlLink Kickin' Ass You're the risk taker that laughs in the face of danger. You seem to be a bit mysterious at times, but everything you do just makes you even more cool. Just be careful that you don't end up dead, like many bad-asses do. Sure, that's me. :/ ...right...no Kingdom Hearts Character: urlLink Take the urlLink Kingdom Hearts personality quiz, and visit urlLink Castle Diqueria . He's my favorite character. =D Well, that's it for now. I've gotta go to bed, it's getting early. =D 'Night all!

AZU MANGA DaiOH Personality Test! 1. Pick a word to describe you. A. ENERGETIC! HYAH! B. I guess Iâm smart... C. Iâm an airheadâ¦ Hey, thatâs a candy, isnât it? D. Animal lover. E. Iâm a prodigy! F. Iâm in charge, and I deserve best!!! G. Evil. H. Well, Iâm mostly a nice personâ¦ ^ ^ I. Athletic. J. Pervert. 2. Say hi to your friend(s)! A. *cutely* Good morning! ^-^ B. Gâmorning, numb nuts! C. *raises hand* Hey. D. â¦..WAZZUP?! E. Hey there, can I borrow $50? F. *stare* *CHOMP!* G. *bows* Hello! H. Hiya! How ya doinâ? *pat* *pat pat pat* *smack!* I. Uhâ¦ Hello. J. Hello girls!!! 3. What do you like to do best? A. Freeload off my friend! B. Stare at girlsâ¦ C. Bite people. D. Pet animals. E. Day dream. F. Eat. G. Train. H. I like being cute! I. Tease people weaker than me! J. Iâll do whatever my friend wants to. 4. Pick a theme for your school festival! A. A coffee shop haunted by the ghosts of cuddly little animals! B. Stuffed animals. C. Whatever makes my students happy. ^__^ D. Ah, whatever. E. A haunted house!!! F. Bikini competition. G. Red stuff. H. Sports festivalâ¦ festival. I. Fish. J. A coffee shop! ^.^ 5. What kind of food do you like best? A. The kind with red stuff in it. B. Hmâ¦ Bananas? C. STEAK! D. Ice cream! E. Chestnuts F. Whatever my friend eats. G. Watermelons. H. Girlsâ¦ Er, grilledâ¦cheese. I. Anything not made from animals. J. Hands. 6. Pick lyrics from a song that you like best. A. Forfeit the game before somebody else takes you out of the frame and put your name to shame cover up your face the pace is too fast you just wonât last. B. Baka baka baka baka baka baka baka baka baka baka baka baka baka!! C. This is the song that never endsâ¦ and it goes on and on my friendsâ¦ Hey, if it never ends, does that mean I have to sing it in my sleep? O.o D. Itâs time for Aaanimaaaniacs! And weâre zaaany tooo the max!! E. Letâs cook together! Letâs cook together! Now, now, letâs see what weâve made! F. Eat it! (Eat it!) Eat it! (Eat it!) Open up your mouth and feed it! G. I like big butts and I cannot lie! H. You want a coke? Maybe some fries? The roast beef comboâs only $9.95. I. Meow, meow, meow, meow! Meow, meow, meow, meow! (etc.) J. How much is that dog-gy in the window? Arf! Arf! The one with the wag-gley tail! 7. What do other people think about you? A. Iâm mysterious and that also makes me cool for some reason. B. Iâm cute! ^ ^ C. Iâm a pervert so the girls run away from meâ¦ *sob* D. Iâm skilled. E. My students like me because Iâm a good teacher. ^__^ F. Iâm spacey and slow. G. I have anger problemsâ¦ YOU THINK THAT TOO, DONâT YOU?! *WHACK!* H. I need to go on a diet. I. Iâm a spastic idiot! YEAH!!! J. Iâm evil, yet cute. 8. WHY DID YOU DO IT?!!!! A. I couldnât help myself I had to watch the girls changing!! B. Iâm sorry, but at least youâve learned your lesson. C. â¦I thought I was doing you a favor. O__o D. Because Iâm evil. E. Iâm very sorry, I hope youâre not mad! F. Iâm sorry! Iâm sorry! It wonât happen again! G. *daydreaming* â¦â¦Wha? H. I DIDNâT DO ANYTHING!!! I. â¦Do what? O___o 9. Say something! A. Quack! B. Fuhgeddaboudit! C. DANCE! DANCE FOR ME, MY PUPPET!!! D. We didnât make first place, but everyone gave it their all, so Iâll reward you! ^__^ E. WHAAAT?! YOU ALL GOT WHIPPED OUT THERE! LOSERS! BOO! BOO!!! F. You gotta smack âem around a bitâ¦ let âem know whoâs boss. G. â¦.Like what? H. You can call me Mr. Kim-Kims, if you want. I. Trivia! Tofu originated in China!.....Ah, youâre no good. J. Letâs do our best! ^-^ 10. Look! Itâs cute! A. Whoaaâ¦So cute! B. Umâ¦sureâ¦ o__o C. Aw, it is cute. ^__^ D. Is it a cute girl? E. *hugs cute thing* ^-^ F. YOU CANâT FOOL ME! YOUâRE TRYING TO SUCK ME IN WITH YOUR CUTENESS!!! G. *Has âcute spasm attackâ because itâs so cute* H. Awâ¦ so cuteâ¦â¦â¦â¦â¦*walks away* I. Wow! You are so cute! *pushes over cute thing* I, uh, couldnât help myself. J. *stares at cute thing* *chomp* Just tell Mochi what you got on the test and she said she'll figure out who you are! :)

Here's some more of those pesky personality tests... Gravitation Character: Well, I got Yuki, but for some reason, the page cannot be found or something like that... Could someone tell me what Yuki is like? Thanks :). X-men Character: You are Wolverine! A loner by nature, you feel uncomfortable when around those you don't know and even those you do. You are awkward when it comes to relationships, but fiercely loyal to those you love. urlLink Which X-Men character are you most like? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Cool! I've always liked Wolverine. He's so cool. Anime Legend: urlLink urlLink theOtaku.com: What Anime Legend Are You? Tenshi Muyo Girl: urlLink urlLink theOtaku.com: What Tenchi Muyo Girl Are You? Yes, I took a test on what girl I was, but at least I got Ryoko! Forest Creature: urlLink urlLink theOtaku.com: What Forest Creature Are You? Awesome! This is my favorite character in that movie. Cowboy Bebop Character: urlLink urlLink theOtaku.com: What Cowboy Bebop Crew Member Are You? Wow, that's a weird looking Faye pic! Anime Type: urlLink What Anime Type Are You? No, just kidding, what I really got was: urlLink What Anime Type Are You? =D Elemental Wolf: Youre the wolf of fire! You are the one who is most likely to be a leader. The wolf of fire has a deep passion for almost anything and is very noble. They are athletic and rough but are still tender on the inside. These are probably not the most rare type but they are still very special. A fire wolf is such a cool being the way they eat and hunt together. If you are the fire wolf then you are very social and proud although you are not always loyal. But, still being the fire wolf is a good thing because they are strong and do most things independently. urlLink What Elemental Wolf Are You? (with pics/read memo) brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Now that is cool! Greek God: Hecate urlLink ?? Which Of The Greek Gods Are You ?? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Alright, that's it for now, there'll be more to come later on :).
